-MiCw_3VXCEIZU2yRX-V.notes: Winner of Haven's Center Award for Lifetime Contribution to Critical Scholarship
-MiCw_3VXCEIZU2yRX-V.quote: "Dissent is the highest form of patriotism."

-MiCwiyDCQElRiN0YCSY.quote: "Propaganda is to a democracy what the bludgeon is to a totalitarian state."

-MiCyIY6VmJPKyh_w66X.quote: "Most election analysts in the U.S. habitually confuse the sound of money talking with the voice of the people."

-MiCy_3V_cLBuvw8lUE6.quote: "The real goal of politics has to be getting people to act on what they already know was wrong."

-MiCz9-XA7dl-8Pitppu.quote: “History teaches us that the capacity for things to get worse is limitless.”

-MiCzjHmlKXlWhkXuA8-.quote: "History is a guide to navigation in perilous times. History is who we are and why we are the way we are."

-MiCzxSNDwmG9eqtjJ5P.quote: “Under observation, we act less free, which means we effectively are less free.”

-MiD-Jg55yEuzvLSSofK.quote: “One view at the highest levels of the U.S. embassy in Kabul by summer’s end was that Karzai “was a very clever madman—just because he was insane doesn’t mean he was stupid.”

-MiD0V_x__6yrEaGbdWs.quote: “Rather than justice for all, we are evolving into a system of justice for those who can afford it."

-MiCy97AQzn1I-ULuaDw.title: A People's History of the United States
